LanguageData.PolarisRestoreMissingBodyPart.descriptio: Restore a missing body part, organ or even bone.

LanguageData.PolarisRemoveImplant.description: Remove all implants in the same body part.
LanguageData.PolarisTransGenderSurgery.label: trans gender
LanguageData.PolarisSurgeryAgeRaise.label: age raise
LanguageData.PolarisSurgeryAgeRaise.description: This operation will increase the patient's biological age of 4 years.
LanguageData.PolarisSurgeryAgeDecrease.label: age decrease
LanguageData.PolarisSurgeryAgeDecrease.description:
This operation will decrease the patient's biological age. To predict the age the patient will lose, simply do the following math (use a calculator):

x=(current age/10+1)*3

Then do this:

current age-x=new age.
